summary: This is a resource with a small sample mod to show you what the mushrooms look like in the game. Each shroom has a corresponding ingredient. The shrooms in game are on the road in front of Pelagia Farm.
descriptionHtml:
More Colorful Shrooms
Author: Mentha
Version: 1.1
Release Date: October 24, 2012
Category: Resources

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Requirements:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Skyrim


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Description:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

This is a resource with a small sample mod to show you what the mushrooms look like in the game. Each shroom has a corresponding ingredient. The shrooms in game are on the road in front of Pelagia Farm.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Details:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

More Colorful Shrooms adds new colors to vanilla mushrooms with ingredients using in game plants with altered textures to make a bigger variety of ingredients and colors for the alchemist. They are standalone and do not change the colors of the vanilla plants, but adds more variety with different colors. I recolored these mushrooms with my mod in mind, but since I am having navmesh issues I will probably not be uploading it any time soon. I decided to share these as I'm pretty pleased with (most) of the results. No the ingredients do not give super powers or new properties, they are only to demonstrate. They have the same effects as the vanilla ingredients.





Included in Version 1.0:

Each of the in ground mushrooms + ingredients in 5 colors
Glowing mushrooms + ingredients in 4 colors
Blackreach mushroom trees in 4 colors plus a version without the glow.
A new dirt and rock texture for the mushroom mesh.
Sample esp

Included in 1.1
added muted red & purple shrooms as per request. Sorry no screens as I am not going to take the time to put them in game. They are labeled 'mute' so you can tell the difference.
Fixed the error caused by removing the glow map on the 'noglo' trees by giving them a blank glow map.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Change log:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

1.0
Release

1.1
Added red & purple muted colors for those who do not like them so bright.
Fixed the glow map error on the 'noglo' trees.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Requests:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

You may ask for another color of the default meshes, but there is no guarantee that it will look nice. Some colors, like white, just don't show up right on the image files.


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Installation:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

1) Extract the contents of the ZIP folder into a temporary folder
2) Cut & Paste files to your Data folder
3) Turn on the mod or use the CK to add the items to your mod.
4) Have fun


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Un-Installation:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

1) Delete the files associated with the mod
2) Remove any meshes used from your .esp
3) Unless it's game breaking, or I forgot something keep your criticism to yourself. You are not required to use this resource.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Incompatibility:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Any mod that changes the grounds in front of and across the river from Pelagia Farm, if you do decide to use the mod, otherwise none.


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Bugs:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

none that I know of


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Credits:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Glowmap tutorial @ Nexus wiki
http://wiki.tesnexus.com/index.php/Glowmaps_101
To The Good Lord
Bethesda for creating Skyrim.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Tools Used:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Nifskope
GIMP
CK

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Usage:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

You may use these files for your mod as long as you do not use them for adult content mods.

You may not use my files if you plan to ask for a donation or charge for your mod.

Otherwise, you do not have to ask for permission but please credit me with a link back to this upload.

You may NOT upload this file to any other site without my permission. You may not put them in any compilation of resources without my permission. It's not that I will say no, but I'm nosy and like to see other people's work.

Please do be kind and leave me a link so I may view your work.
author: Mentha
